solution_line_template: There are {total_students} x {glasses_percent_num}% = <<{total_students}*{glasses_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={students_wear_glasses}>>{students_wear_glasses} students who wear glasses.

There are {total_students} x {contact_lenses_percent_num}% = <<{total_students}*{contact_lenses_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={students_wear_contact_lenses}>>{students_wear_contact_lenses} students who wear contact lenses.

There are {students_wear_glasses} + {students_wear_contact_lenses} = <<{students_wear_glasses}+{students_wear_contact_lenses}={students_wear_vision_assistance}>>{students_wear_vision_assistance} students who wear vision assistance.

There are {total_students} - {students_wear_vision_assistance} = <<{total_students}-{students_wear_vision_assistance}={students_no_vision_assistance}>>{students_no_vision_assistance} students who do not wear any vision assistance wear.
